org.knime.core.node.workflow

Class Annotation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.knime.core.node.workflow.Annotation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, UIInformation
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NodeAnnotation, WorkflowAnnotation

    public abstract class Annotation
extends Object
implements UIInformation
    An annotation on the workflow. It keeps all relevant information, such as text, bg color and individual formatting. The fields in this class follow the content of an SWT StyledText widget.
    Author:
    Bernd Wiswedel, KNIME.com, Zurich, Switzerland

      Create new annotation with arg data (not null).

      • setDimensionNoNotify

        protected void setDimensionNoNotify(int x,
                                    int y,
                                    int width,
                                    int height)
        Set dimensions, but don't notify any listener. (Used only by the GUI for node annotations for legacy support. Sets dimensions in old workflows without making the flow dirty.)
        Parameters:
        x - coordinate
        y - coordinate
        width - of the annotation
        height - of the component

      • save

        public void save(NodeSettingsWO config)
        Stores all contained information into the given configuration.
        Specified by:
        save in interface UIInformation
        Parameters:
        config - The configuration to write the current settings into.
        See Also:

      • load

        public void load(NodeSettingsRO config,
                 FileWorkflowPersistor.LoadVersion loadVersion)
          throws InvalidSettingsException
        Reads the information from the NodeSettings object. loads new values and fires change event.
        Specified by:
        load in interface UIInformation
        Parameters:
        config - Retrieve the data from.
        loadVersion - The workflow version that was used to store this object
        Throws:
        InvalidSettingsException - If the required keys are not available in the NodeSettings.
        See Also:
        UIInformation.save(org.knime.core.node.NodeSettingsWO)

      • copyFrom

        public void copyFrom(AnnotationData annotationData,
                     boolean includeBounds)
        Copy content, styles, position from the argument and notify listeners.
        Parameters:
        annotationData - To copy from.
        includeBounds - Whether to also update x, y, width, height. If false, it will only a copy the text with its styles
